column3: dies of gas-gangrene in his wounds
column4: sustained 4 days earlier. The news doesnt reach J.R.R. Tolkien until the 16 Decemberth.

column1: * 1954 - The BBC broadcasts the radio play of The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth
* 1955 - Tolkiens poem Imram is published in Time and Tide (3 December 1955).
* 1998 - Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue Tyalië Tyelelliéva 13 is published.
* 2004 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony plays in wikipedia:Newark
* 2009 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Siege of Mirkwood is released in Europe.
